name: Mini Flight Simulator
description:
Game developed for the Jamulator Jam.

A simple flight simulator. No physics, just basic controls to move the plane. There is also a challenge mode. Don't leave the play area... :)

Note: after pressing the button to start the game, it needs a few seconds to actually load it.

Instructions (the controller may not work on all browsers - in that case you can use also one of the downloadable versions for Windows, Mac OS or Linux. The keyboard should work correctly everywhere)

joy left or wasd to move

joy right or up/down/left/right to move camera

joy left button or space to reset plane rotation

joy right button or enter to reset camera position

trigger left/right or k/l to decelerate/accelerate

bumper right/left or i/o to zoom in and out with camera

press T to enable/disable the wing trails

press esc during game for the button to go back to main menu
